text: California unveiled a new, color-coded ‚ÄúBlueprint for a Safer Economy‚Äù that replaces the state‚Äôs coronavirus watch list. See what this means for schools, businesses and more in each Bay Area county. https://t.co/lPsAGojjZ0 https://t.co/RsuLUGJDeV

name: sfchronicle
text:
The Bay Area's fire season was kicked into high gear after nearly 11,000 lightning strikes ignited 350 fires. See photos and videos of the battle to contain the blazes engulfing areas of Napa, Sonoma and Solano counties, all the way down to Vacaville.

name: sfchronicle
text:
The San Francisco Museum of Modern Art announced furloughs for all full-time and some part-time employees. This will result in a 20% reduction of hours and pay, roughly equivalent to losing one workday a week.

https://t.co/zuLzXFnjbn

text:

‚Ä¢ Streamline the permitting process

name: sfchronicle
text:
The San Francisco Giants, like other teams, are wearing Jackie Robinson‚Äôs number 42 on Jackie Robinson Day, which was moved to Friday, the 75th anniversary of Robinson‚Äôs first meeting with Branch Rickey of the Brooklyn Dodgers.

name: sfchronicle
text:
Chadwick Boseman has died at the age of 43 following a four-year battle with colon cancer. 

He took on big iconic roles ‚Äî Thurgood Marshall, Jackie Robinson, and the Black Panther. @MickLaSalle wrote he might be the American actor of this generation. 

https://t.co/XWIUu7kts5

name: sfchronicle
text:
The USPS was removing six mail collection boxes in Oakland on Friday. The agency says the move was to prevent vandalism during expected demonstrations in the city. But local elected leaders condemned the decision and accused USPS of election interference.

https://t.co/rjkPspbZ9M

name: sfchronicle
text:
Following in the footsteps of other women who helped pave the way, @KamalaHarris made history as the first Black woman and Asian American person to be nominated for vice president on a major party ticket.

name: sfchronicle
text:
Since becoming the Warriors‚Äô head coach, Steve Kerr has tried to foster the same brotherhood in the Bay Area that Lute Olson once made a staple of his Arizona locker rooms ‚Äî the ability to make a team feel like family.

name: sfchronicle
text:
In the Bay Area, only Napa County and San Francisco were given the green light to partially reopen. 

Napa officials said businesses will be able to reopen next week at 25% capacity. Meanwhile, S.F. had no immediate plans to loosen restrictions.

https://t.co/bFL2P3xLsS

name: sfchronicle
text: RT @SFC_Datebook: @MickLaSalle Chadwick Boseman, who played Black icons Jackie Robinson and James Brown before finding fame as the regal Black Panther in the Marvel cinematic universe, died Friday of cancer, his representative said. He was 43. https://t.co/VzHTcITNW6
